name: mixer-logic-backend
description: Backend for mixer logic drinks page

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../mixer-logic/ && git pull && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../mixer-logic-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: git pull && npm run build:ui && npm run pm2:start
scripts.pm2:start: sudo pm2 delete 'mixer-logic' && sudo pm2 start index.js --name 'mixer-logic'

author: Oheneba Poku-Marboah
